content.rendered:
People

Qi Gu

Dr Gu is currently appointed as a Full Professor at Institute for Stem Cell and Regeneration (ISCR) | Institute of Zoology (IOZ), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) and group leader of Bioinspired Engineering. He has interdisciplinary training in materials chemistry and stem cells. His first doctoral career (2009-2013) is mainly engaged in research on stem cells at Northeast Agricultural University and Chinese Academy of Sciences. He completed a second PhD (2013-2017) in Chemistry at University of Wollongong (UOW) followed by being appointed as a Principal Investigator at IOZ, CAS and establishing his lab, Bioinspired Engineering. He became Full Professor at IOZ, CAS at the end of 2019. Professor Gu has developed novel biomaterials and used bioprinting for advanced human stem cell culture and 3D tissue engineering and reported the first examples of generation human tissues by 3D bioprinting human neural and pluripotent stem cells (Gu et al, 2016 and 2017, Advanced Healthcare Materials). Professor Gu has previously published has 22 first-author or corresponding author peer-reviewed journal articles, including Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., Advanced Healthcare Materials, National Science Reviews, Advanced Theraputics and Stem Cell Reports etc., mostly on bioprinting, biofabrication, biomaterials and stem cell engineering over the past 5 years. Besides, Gu has been co-author of 3 book chapters and co-inventor on three patents.

Principal Investigator

Ph.D. Professor

Principal Investigator

Ph.D. Professor

OUR Team

100

100

100
Former Members

Postdoctoral Associates

Xinhuan Wang

Postdoctoral Associate

XINHUAN got her B.S and M.S in chemistry at Yangzhou University. In 2019, she obtained her Doctor’s degree in physical chemistry at the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences. There, she designed material based composites and novel structures with visible-light response properties. After that, she joined Gu lab for postdoctoral training, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

Research Interest:
Designing biopolymer-based micro-hydrogel for applications in constructing vascular networks.

Shuo Wang

Postdoctoral Associate

SHUO got his B.S degree in Mechanical Engineering at Beijing Institute of Technology. After that, he deviated his research interests in biomedical engineering. He got his M.S and Ph.D. degrees in Mechanical Engineering-Engineering Mechanics at Michigan Technological University in 2018, specializing in cartilage tissue engineering by using a new microfluidic approach. He joined Dr. Arinzeh’s lab at New Jersey Institute of Technology as a postdoc from 2018 to 2019 and studied several biomaterials for bone, cartilage, and neural tissues. He joined Dr. Gu’s lab in 2020 as a postdoc. In his spare time, he enjoys watching stand-up comedy and movies, and playing with his two sons.

Research Interest:
He is currently focusing on regenerative medicine and biomanufacturing research. His research interests include the novel muscular tissue engineering strategies by using 3D printing, electrospinning, and the interaction between muscle cells and microenvironment and external physical stimulants.

Shen Ji

Postdoctoral Associate

SHEN got his B.S degree in Pharmaceutical Engineering at Yunnan University. Then, he successfully obtained his M.S and Ph.D. degrees in Chemical Engineering at the New Jersey Institute of Technology in 2016 and 2020. During his doctoral studies, he focused on developing novel inks and approaches for printing tissues and organs. In 2020, He joined Dr. Gu’s lab as a postdoc. 

Research Interest:
Bioprinting of large-scale vascularized tissue/organs

Shuyu Zhang

Postdoctoral Associate

SHUYU got her B.S degree in Pharmaceutical Analysis at Beijing University of Chinese Medicine. Then, she was recommended to the Institute of Clinical Pharmacology, School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Sun Yat-sen University, and obtained a Ph.D. degree in pharmacology in 2018. During her doctoral period, she conducted retrospective or prospective clinical trials on anti-coagulant and anesthetic drugs to develop personalized dosing algorithms based on pharmacogenomic or metabolic findings. After graduation, she had experience in Individualized Medicine implementation in a 3A hospital and then drug development in a high-tech enterprise. In 2020, she joined Dr. Gu’s lab as a joint postdoc.

Research Interest:
Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic modeling based on Organs-on-chips.

Ronghang Wang

Postdoctoral Associate

RONGHANG got her B.S degree in Thermal Engineering at Central South University. After that, she got her Ph.D. degree in Power Engineering and Engineering Thermophysics at the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences. She focused on the microfluidic system and wearable sensors during her doctoral period. She joined Dr. Gu’s lab in 2021 as a postdoc. She enjoys reading science fiction, painting, yoga, and playing with her little baby in her leisure time.

Research Interest:
Designing and fabricating microfluidic chips to explore the principle of organ formation and regeneration

Visiting Students / Scholars

Ph.D. STUDENTS

Yongchao Duan

Joint Doctoral Candidate

2016.08 till now, Medical School, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, major in regenerative medicine.
2012.09 – 2016.07, Henan Agricultural University, major in biotechnology, B.S.

Research Interest:
ECM based hydrogel to print functional tissues with neuronal network and vascular vessels.

Jingwen Xu

Doctoral Candidate

2018.09 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

Research Interest:
Materials development to control cell movement and to be used in skin repair/fabrication.

Jia Guo

Doctoral Candidate

2018.08 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2015.09 – 2018.07, Northeast Agricultural University, major in developmental biology, M.S.
2011.09 – 2015.07, Northeast Agricultural University, major in biological science, B.S.

Research Interest:
Simulation system to explain the mechanism of collective cell migration for early development embryos.

Xin Liu

Joint Doctoral Candidate

Research Interest:
Integrated system to study vascular networks and to print multi-materials. 

Shenglong Ding

Joint Doctoral Candidate

2020.09 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing TongRen Hospital of Capital Medical University, major in Orthopedic Surgery.
2017.09 – 2020.06, Zhongshan Hospital, Fudan university, major in Orthopedic Surgery, M.M.
2012.09 – 2017.06, Nanchang University, major in clinical medicine, B.S.

Research Interest:
Bionic hydrogel for applications in cartilage regeneration by using 3D printing.

Zili Gao

Doctoral Candidate

2018.09 till now, Savaid Medical School, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, major in regenerative medicine.
2014.09 – 2018.07, Shandong Agricultural University, major in biotechnology, B.S.

Research Interest:
Microspheres & Biointerfaces & Functional Units

Tan Jia

Joint Doctoral Candidate

2021.09 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences
2017.9-2021.7, Shandong University

Research Interest:
Manipulate cell morphological characteristics in 3D printing

Master's Students

Wenhui Huang

Graduate Student

2019.09 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2018.03 – 2019.06 Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, joint undergraduate.
2015.09 – 2018.01 Hebei University, major in biological science.

Research Interest:
Hard-soft composition bioink

Minxuan Jia

Graduate Student

2020.06 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, major in regenerative medicine.

Research Interest:
Materials development to study cell migration perpendicular to the interface

Jinqiu Zhangjing

Joint Graduate Student

2020.09 till now, Northeast Agriculture University, Harbin. 
2018.05 – 2019.08, Research Assistant, Gulab, IOZ, CAS.

Research Interest:
Stem cells & Developmental biology & Biofabrication

Haitao Guo

Graduate Student

2021.09 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2017.9-2021.6, Nanchang University, major in Material Forming and Control Engineering.

Research Interest:
Biomedical Materials and 3D printing preparation.

Juan Wu

Graduate Student

2021.09 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2017.09-2021.06 Tianjin Medical University, major in Biomedical Engineering.

Research Interest:
Biomedical Materials and 3D printing preparation.

Undergraduate Students

Yuxin Xia

Undergraduate Research Assistant

2020.05 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2018.09 till now, University of Washington, majoring in Applied Physics.

Research Interest:
Effect of physical enviroment on cell migration.

Staff

Lixun Zhou

Laboratory Manager

2019 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, supervise and maintain the experiment order, manage experiment finance related works, secretary works of the lab.
2015.07-2019.06, lab manager, Institute of Genetics and Development Biology Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2016.09-2019.06, Joint-Postgraduates, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University and Institute of Genetics and Development Biology Chinese Academy of Sciences, major in crop genetics and breeding.

Wenli Liu

Laboratory Engineer
2018.07 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, 3D modeling, operation, and maintenance of 3D printers and related equipment.

Kai Li

Research Assistant

KAI acquired his master’s degree in 2019 majored in Materials Engineering at the Viterbi School of Engineering at the University of Southern California (USC). From 2013 to 2017, he studied at the University of Science and Technology Beijing and majored in Materials Science and Engineering.

Research Interest:
Complicated printing paths for bio-gradience and bio-anisotropy to be used in heart construction.

Xiyuan Zhao

Research Assistant

2020.06 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, mainly engages in the preparation of microcarriers.
2017.09 – 2020.06, studied at Beijing University of Chemical Technology with a master’s degree in materials science and engineering. The main work is to characterize and study the microparticles, existing forms and chemical composition of rubber, and change the properties of materials by changing the structure.

Research Interest:
Microgel system development for stem cell culture and printing

Wenling Xu

Research Assistant


Research Interest:

Song Han

Research Assistant

2021.07 till now, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
2018.09 – 2021.06, Beijing University of Chemical Technology, major in bioengineering, M.S.
2014.09 – 2018.07, Beijing University of Chemical Technology, major in bioengineering, B.S.

Research Interest:
Microgel system development for stem cell culture and printing
